name: Rei Kawakubo
intro: Japanese fashion designer based in Tokyo and Paris. She is the founder of Comme des Garçons and Dover Street Market.

name: Constantin Brancusi
intro: February 19, 1876 – March 16, 1957) was a Romanian sculptor, painter and photographer who made his career in France. He is considered one of the most influential sculptors of the 20th century and a pioneer of modernism.

name: Nina Simone
intro: American singer, songwriter, pianist, and civil rights activist. Her music spanned styles including classical, folk, gospel, blues, jazz, R&B, and pop.

name: Ruth Asawa
intro: Best known for her large-scale, intricately woven sculptures and public art commissions, Asawa was a pillar of strength and a teacher to many.
